comment: A pair of an empty set (of edges) and a second set (of vertices) is a cycle if and only if the second set contains exactly one vertex (in an undirected graph). (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 31-Jan-2021.) (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2021.)
